body.name: Flexible Webcam Stand and Cell Phone Tripod with Holder for Logitech and Nexigo Webcam, GoPro Camera and More.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 26 mins
features: Flexible tripod is compatible with Logitech and Nexigo webcams, iPhone/android phones, GoPro and digital cameras and other 1/4'' threaded devices.
Excellent details make webcam stand tripod stable and durable, and it works well on desks with non-slip feet. Also adjustable with a 360-degree rotation ball.
All accessories in one package make mini phone tripod multifunction. Dual-hole phone holder is suitable for cell phones of various sizes and different angles.
The 7-inch long selfie stick tripod is lightweight and portable, making it easy to travel and use. Fittings are very suitable for GoPro, Sjcam and Xiaoyi cameras.
Complete tripod legs are made of very flexible sponge and metal, which can adapt to tables, bicycles, trees, railings and other environments.

The tripod is ideal for webcam, sport camera, iPhone 11 /11 Pro/Xs MAX /XR X /8 /7 /6S Plus /6 /5S, Samsung Galaxy S10/S10+/S8 Plus /S8 /S9 Plu /S9 /Note 8, LG, HTC, Motorola and other mobile phones. Also supports Digital Camera & Other Devices with 1/4" thread.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little gadget has saved my life and my grade many times. I’m a nursing student taking online classes. Some instructors require that we use a webcam that shows the entire room and entire body along with a close up shot of our face. That’s hard to do with a full size tripod. So this mini version proves to be worth its weight in gold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: It worked perfect for me. I have soft hands and take care of my things. Not for rude hands or for those who never read instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: What I appreciate about this product was how light weight it was, almost unexpectedly. I am imagining and trying to find ways to store it in my bags. Its flexibility has been helpful in that mater. Just have to be mindful on the loose attachments that come with the product. (The different holders, screws.) Will buy other products from this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: As Santa Claus I needed a small Tripod for my Virtual Visits with children. It is just what I needed to hold my webcam for these visits. The Tripod is a valuable tool in my arsenal.Santa Chuck and Mrs Sandy Claus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The screw is plastic and very week. Broke in a month of light use on weekends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Finicky but decent
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to have a better stand for my webcam while I streamed. Unfortunately this product doesn’t fit very well with my setup and therefore doesn’t get used. But it definitely holds up to what it says it does. My only complaint is that for the webcam I was using there was no real way to MOUNT it to the stand. It just kind of sat on the cushioned top Mount (but I may not be doing it right and may be using it improperly)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: It is performing as expected, holds a stationary webcam on my desk for virtual meetings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
